about_the_game:
**ONLY THE HOST OF A LOBBY NEEDS THE DLC FOR ALL PLAYERS IN LOBBY TO HAVE ACCESS TO THE NEW MAP!**




Dinosaurs! Gladiators! Vikings!

Discover all this and more in the new MUSEUM stage in the first-ever DLC for Just Act Natural! The MUSEUM DLC comes with a new hand-sculpted stage that you can play on in EVERY Just Act Natural game mode as well as all kinds of history-themed cosmetics!



The Museum stage features the Big Ruby in several different game modes. Hider players can STEAL this Ruby both in Diamond Grab AND other game modes to score big points.

However, doing so will activate SECURITY GATES, cutting off the stealer from escaping across the stage for a short time.

Features:
  • New hand-sculpted Museum stage for all Just Act Natural Game Modes!
  • Shared access for every player your lobby, even if they don't own the DLC!
  • New hand-sculpted cosmetics for Hider players!
  • New hand-sculpted ‘Pterodactyl’ Seeker avatar
  • New Museum-themed lobby icons and name cards
  • Only the Host of a lobby needs the DLC for all players to play!

name: Just Act Natural: Museum

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: This adds a new hand-sculpted stage: "Museum" to all Just Act Natural game modes! Also features brand new museum-themed cosmetics. Only the host of the lobby needs this DLC for all players in the lobby to access the map.
